help.title: ğŸ° Daily Draw Bot Help
help.description: Welcome to the Daily Draw bot!

draw.name: ğŸ² Draw System
draw.value:
**Prefix Commands:**
`!draw <count>` - Run your daily draw (1 free pull, up to {max_paid_draws} paid pulls/day at {wheel_cost} pts each; defaults to 1)
`!check [member]` - View balance and draw status
`!giftpoints <member> <points>` - Gift points to another user

**Rules:**
- ğŸ‰ **Free Draw:** 1 free pull per day
- ğŸ° **Paid Draw:** Up to {max_paid_draws} per day, {wheel_cost} points each
- â° **Reset:** Resets daily at midnight Eastern Time
- ğŸ’° **Rewards:** 10â€“1000 points, average return 103.8%

egg.name: ğŸ¥š Egg System
egg.value:
**Slash Commands:**
`/egg action:draw` - Draw eggs (single 250 pts, ten-draw 2250 pts)
`/egg action:list` - View your egg inventory
`/egg action:hatch` - Hatch a selected egg
`/egg action:claim` - Claim a hatched pet

pet.name: ğŸ¾ Pet System
pet.value:
**Slash Commands:**
`/pet action:list [page]` - List pets (paged)
`/pet action:info` - Inspect a pet
`/pet action:upgrade` - Promote pet rarity (requires shards & points)
`/pet action:dismantle` - Dismantle pets for shards
`/pet action:fragments` - Check shard inventory
`/pet action:equip` - Equip a pet for passive income
`/pet action:unequip` - Unequip the active pet
`/pet action:status` - Review equipped status and pending rewards
`/pet action:claim` - Claim passive points
`/pet action:feed` - Feed pets for XP

**Auto Feed:**
`/feed auto [pet] [mode] [quantity]` - One-click feeding

shop.name: ğŸª Grocery Shop
shop.value:
**Slash Commands:**
`/shop action:view menu` - View today's items
`/shop action:buy item:<name> quantity:<amount>` - Purchase food
`/inventory item_type:food` - Inspect your food inventory

forge.name: ğŸ”¨ Forge
forge.value:
**Slash Commands:**
`/forge action:view` - Show shard inventory and recipes
`/forge action:craft from_rarity:<from> to_rarity:<to> quantity:<amount>` - Craft higher rarity shards

**Recipes:**
- C â†’ R: 10:1 + 50 pts
- R â†’ SR: 5:1 + 80 pts
- SR â†’ SSR: 3:1 + 100 pts

roles.name: ğŸ·ï¸ Role Shop
roles.value:
**Slash Commands:**
`/tag action:shop` - View purchasable roles
`/tag action:buy role_name:<role>` - Buy a role

quiz.name: ğŸ® Quiz System
quiz.value:
**Prefix Commands:**
`!quizlist [language]` - List quiz categories
  â€¢ `!quizlist` or `!quizlist all` - Show every category
  â€¢ `!quizlist chinese` - Only Chinese quizzes
  â€¢ `!quizlist english` - Only English quizzes

**Tips:**
- Each correct answer rewards 20 points
- Await staff to start quiz rounds

blackjack.name: ğŸ° Blackjack
blackjack.value:
**Slash Commands:**
`/blackjack play <bet>` - Start a blackjack round
  â€¢ `bet`: numeric amount or `all`
  â€¢ Examples: `/blackjack play 100`, `/blackjack play all`
`/blackjack stats` - Review your blackjack stats

**Gameplay:**
- ğŸ´âœ‹ **Actions:** Hit & Stand
- ğŸ² **Double Down:** Double after first hand
- âœ‚ï¸ **Split:** Split pairs
- ğŸ²âœ‚ï¸ **DAS:** Double after split (reduces house edge)
- ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Insurance:** Available against dealer Ace
- ğŸ³ï¸ **Surrender:** Cut losses on bad hands

**Features:**
- âœ… Dealer stands on 17
- âœ… Blackjack pays 2.5Ã—
- âœ… Full game logging & stats

leaderboard.name: ğŸ† Leaderboards
leaderboard.value:
**Slash Commands:**
`/leaderboard [type]` - Show top 10 rankings

**Types:**
- `points` - Points leaderboard (default)
- `pets` - Pet count leaderboard
- `hatched eggs` - Hatched egg leaderboard
- `blackjack wins` - Blackjack wins leaderboard

**Examples:**
â€¢ `/leaderboard` - Points leaderboard
â€¢ `/leaderboard type:pets` - Pet leaderboard
â€¢ `/leaderboard type:hatched eggs` - Hatched egg leaderboard
â€¢ `/leaderboard type:blackjack wins` - Blackjack leaderboard

admin.name: âš™ï¸ Admin Commands
admin.value:
**System:**
`/language` - Set server language
`!rewardinfo` - Show reward probabilities
`!checksubscription` - Check subscription status

**Role Shop:**
`!addtag <price> <role>` - Add a purchasable role
`!removetag <role>` - Remove a role from the shop
`!updatetagprice <role> <price>` - Update role price
`!listtags` - List all configured roles

**Quiz:**
`!quiz "<category>" <count>` - Start a quiz
  â€¢ Exact match: `!quiz anime 5`
  â€¢ Fuzzy: `!quiz study 5` (matches study:xxx)
  â€¢ Each correct answer rewards 20 points

**Points:**
`!givepoints <member> <points>` - Grant points
`!setpoints <member> <points>` - Set balance

help.footer: 1 free draw per day; up to {max_paid_draws} paid draws/day at {wheel_cost} points each
